title: nova-compute stops reporting in grenade

comments.content:
Seen in 
http://logs.openstack.org/39/70239/1/check/check-grenade-dsvm/6f4b3bf/logs/new/screen-n-sch.txt.gz

15:38 < jog0> lifeless: it looks like it has happend before

comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~lifeless

comments.content:
It looks like n-cpu (http://logs.openstack.org/39/70239/1/check/check-grenade-dsvm/6f4b3bf/logs/new/screen-n-cpu.txt.gz) just stops logging and presumably doing anything  at 2014-01-30 23:22:49.183 and then the scheduler  starts erroring out at http://logs.openstack.org/39/70239/1/check/check-grenade-dsvm/6f4b3bf/logs/new/screen-n-sch.txt.gz#_2014-01-30_23_26_06_767 because of no heartbeats from the compute node.

Also swift is throwing some cryptic errors around the same time nova-compute stops logging:

http://logs.openstack.org/39/70239/1/check/check-grenade-dsvm/6f4b3bf/logs/syslog.txt.gz
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~jogo

comments.content: The swift errors are unrelated, and due to the grenade upgrade process.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~jogo

comments.content: Its not clear if this is a valid bug, or an issue with https://review.openstack.org/#/c/70239/
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~jogo

comments.content: (Oh, and it was a -very- valid bug :)
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~lifeless
